originalText.text: My son was poorly cared for at this school, I was threatened by a director or whatever her title is-Sheila is her name- when I enquired about my son King Roper, she was disgustingly disrespectful and i do not want my son in the presence of the staff any longer. Very unprofessional in handling situations of personal parent and child business which reflects in Sheila and Maria's poor character, no telling what happens when one isn't looking, tho the teachers in the class seem fair.

originalText.text: A teacher is very unprofessional & rude especially that she works with children.. don't feel comfortable leaving my child w/ her. Thank God my son was switched over after I filed a complaint. This teacher wouldn't even say Good Morning to my son... I always ignored her immaturity coming from an older woman. I won't post name on here but she knows who she is.

originalText.text: It's on the 1st floor of my building. My grandniece attended Pequeño Souls and learned a lot at this daycare facility. I recommend it to anyone Who is interested in placing their child in a safe, educational environment.

originalText.text: I took .my child there for convenience they are always late and take the kids out during a FIRE DRILL with no coats on but the teachers had on theirs......SMH......
